description: ['Get the date of the first day of the current year @return date']
focal_method: public static Date yearStart() {    final GregorianCalendar calendar = new GregorianCalendar(US);    calendar.set(DAY_OF_YEAR, 1);    return calendar.getTime();  }
test_case: @Test  public void yearStart() {    Date date = DateUtils.yearStart();    assertNotNull(date);    GregorianCalendar calendar = new GregorianCalendar();    calendar.setTime(date);    assertEquals(1, calendar.get(DAY_OF_YEAR));  }
